ygData.subject: RE: Song Taunting.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m upset about this. First time I fought Lucan it was a close fight, we d had to zone 2 times already and our two highest level players left so I was 2nd
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
> From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]

> During the Lucan fight, I tossed everything I had at the guy
> and right before the party wiped him out, I zoned out. Was
> a pretty fun night, and I still can visit the bard guild in
> Freeport <g>

I'm upset about this. First time I fought Lucan it was a close fight, we'd
had to zone 2 times already and our two highest level players left so I was
2nd high man on the totem pole at 43. I couldn't leave and expect that the
rest of the group could survive the reincarnate. Ugh. My group, got the
experience which was a shock, but even more shocking, I went from
indifferent to scowls even in wolf form!! ARGH! The cleric in my group who
was dubious before the fight also got the faction hit for both kills and is
still dubious, WTF?!?

I can still go to the bard's guild, I just have to announce a train and make
sure I have my drum out when I run through East or West Freeport. I used to
go invis but the militia scum has added a couple of guards that see invis
now so that strategy no longer works.

They can't kill me if they can't catch me!!

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 45 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
